title: (x) "Tube" sans - FF Nuvo {Yves}
content:
Hello,

please help me with this font... thanks!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [tube.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20090503105853/http:/typophile.com/files/tube.jpg) | 14.57 KB |
author: technopaegnion

comments.content:
It seems very similar to some of Luc(as) de Groot’s work, such as [Corpid](http://web.archive.org/web/20090503105853/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/lucasfonts/lf-corpid-iii/). It looks slightly more condensed than Corpid, and the stem on the ’u’ seems bent, but I think the b is a de Groot shape.

- Mike Yanega

in case this remains unsolved: [Pragma](http://web.archive.org/web/20090503105853/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/neufville/pragma-nd/) is similar, and [Nubian](http://web.archive.org/web/20090503105853/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/fw-g-type/nubian/) is not too far off either.

Ah, Yves to the rescue. Good catch from those few letters. That’s a new font for me.

- Mike Yanega

<cite>I think the b is a de Groot shape.</cite>

Well, [Siegfried Rückel](http://web.archive.org/web/20090503105853/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/designer/siegfried_ruckel/) studied under Luc(as) de Groot in Potsdam. An amazing eye, Mike! ;-)
